Signal Arithmetic And Logical Operations ï

Functions that provide common arithmetic and logical operations.

Signal Arithmetic Functions ï

Arithmetic Operations ï

The set of arithmetic operations for signal processing available in the library.

Signal AddC ï

AddC ï

Adds a constant value to each sample of a signal.

Functions

NppStatus nppsAddC_8u_ISfs_Ctx ( Npp8u nValue , Npp8u * pSrcDst , size_t nLength , int nScaleFactor , NppStreamContext nppStreamCtx ) ï

8-bit unsigned char in place signal add constant, scale, then clamp to saturated value

Parameters

  • pSrcDst â In-Place Signal Pointer .

  • nValue â Constant value to be added to each vector element

  • nLength â Signal Length .

  • nScaleFactor â Integer Result Scaling .

  • nppStreamCtx â Application Managed Stream Context .

Returns

Signal Data Related Error Codes , Length Related Error Codes .

Signal AddProductC ï

AddProductC ï

Adds product of a constant and each sample of a source signal to the each sample of destination signal.

Functions

NppStatus nppsAddProductC_32f_Ctx ( const Npp32f * pSrc , Npp32f nValue , Npp32f * pDst , size_t nLength , NppStreamContext nppStreamCtx ) ï

32-bit floating point signal add product of signal times constant to destination signal.

Parameters

  • pSrc â Source Signal Pointer .

  • nValue â Constant value to be multiplied by each vector element

  • pDst â Destination Signal Pointer .

  • nLength â Signal Length .

  • nppStreamCtx â Application Managed Stream Context .

Returns

Signal Data Related Error Codes , Length Related Error Codes .

NppStatus nppsAddProductC_32f ( const Npp32f * pSrc , Npp32f nValue , Npp32f * pDst , size_t nLength ) ï

32-bit floating point signal add product of signal times constant to destination signal.

Parameters

  • pSrc â Source Signal Pointer .

  • nValue â Constant value to be multiplied by each vector element

  • pDst â Destination Signal Pointer .

  • nLength â Signal Length .

Returns

Signal Data Related Error Codes , Length Related Error Codes .

Signal MulC ï

MulC ï

Multiplies each sample of a signal by a constant value.

Functions

NppStatus nppsMulC_8u_ISfs_Ctx ( Npp8u nValue , Npp8u * pSrcDst , size_t nLength , int nScaleFactor , NppStreamContext nppStreamCtx ) ï

8-bit unsigned char in place signal times constant, scale, then clamp to saturated value

Parameters

  • pSrcDst â In-Place Signal Pointer .

  • nValue â Constant value to be multiplied by each vector element

  • nLength â Signal Length .

  • nScaleFactor â Integer Result Scaling .

  • nppStreamCtx â Application Managed Stream Context .

Returns

Signal Data Related Error Codes , Length Related Error Codes .

NppStatus nppsMulC_8u_ISfs ( Npp8u nValue , Npp8u * pSrcDst , size_t nLength , int nScaleFactor ) ï

8-bit unsigned char in place signal times constant, scale, then clamp to saturated value

Parameters

  • pSrcDst â In-Place Signal Pointer .

  • nValue â Constant value to be multiplied by each vector element

  • nLength â Signal Length .

  • nScaleFactor â Integer Result Scaling .

Returns

Signal Data Related Error Codes , Length Related Error Codes .

Signal SubC ï

SubC ï

Subtracts a constant from each sample of a signal.

Functions

NppStatus nppsSubC_8u_ISfs_Ctx ( Npp8u nValue , Npp8u * pSrcDst , size_t nLength , int nScaleFactor , NppStreamContext nppStreamCtx ) ï

  • nScaleFactor â Integer Result Scaling .

Signal SubCRev ï

SubCRev ï

Subtracts each sample of a signal from a constant.

Functions

NppStatus nppsSubCRev_8u_ISfs_Ctx ( Npp8u nValue , Npp8u * pSrcDst , size_t nLength , int nScaleFactor , NppStreamContext nppStreamCtx ) ï

Signal DivC ï

DivC ï

Divides each sample of a signal by a constant.

Functions

Signal Data Related Error Codes , Length Related Error Codes .

AddProduct ï

  • pSrc1 â Source Signal Pointer .

  • pSrc2 â Source Signal Pointer . signal2 elements to be multiplied by signal1 elements

  • pDst â Destination Signal Pointer .

  • nLength â Signal Length .

  • nppStreamCtx â Application Managed Stream Context .

Returns

Signal Data Related Error Codes , Length Related Error Codes .

  • pSrcDst â In-Place Signal Pointer . signal2 elements to be multiplied by signal1 elements

  • nLength â Signal Length .

Returns

Signal Data Related Error Codes , Length Related Error Codes .

Signal Sub ï

Sub ï

Sample by sample subtraction of the samples of two signals.

Functions

NppStatus nppsSub_16s_Ctx ( const Npp16s * pSrc1 , const Npp16s * pSrc2 , Npp16s * pDst , size_t nLength , NppStreamContext nppStreamCtx ) ï

Signal Data Related Error Codes , Length Related Error Codes .

Signal Div ï

Div ï

Sample by sample division of the samples of two signals.

Functions

NppStatus nppsDiv_8u_Sfs_Ctx ( const Npp8u * pSrc1 , const Npp8u * pSrc2 , Npp8u * pDst , size_t nLength , int nScaleFactor , NppStreamContext nppStreamCtx ) ï

  • pSrc2 â Source Signal Pointer , signal1 divisor elements to be divided into signal2 dividend elements.

  • pDst â Destination Signal Pointer .

  • nLength â Signal Length .

  • nScaleFactor â Integer Result Scaling .

  • nppStreamCtx â Application Managed Stream Context .

Div_Round ï

Functions

  • nScaleFactor â Integer Result Scaling .

  • nppStreamCtx â Application Managed Stream Context .

Signal Data Related Error Codes , Length Related Error Codes .

Signal SumLn ï

SumLn ï

Sums up the natural logarithm of each sample of a signal.

Functions

NppStatus nppsSumLnGetBufferSize_32f_Ctx ( size_t nLength , size_t * hpBufferSize , NppStreamContext nppStreamCtx ) ï

Device scratch buffer size (in bytes) for 32f SumLn.

This primitive provides the correct buffer size for nppsSumLn_32f.

Parameters

  • nLength â Signal Length .

  • hpBufferSize â Required buffer size. Important: hpBufferSize is a host pointer. Scratch Buffer and Host Pointer .

  • nppStreamCtx â Application Managed Stream Context .

Returns

NPP_SUCCESS

NppStatus nppsSumLnGetBufferSize_32f ( size_t nLength , size_t * hpBufferSize ) ï

Parameters

  • nLength â Signal Length .

  • hpBufferSize â Required buffer size. Important: hpBufferSize is a host pointer. Scratch Buffer and Host Pointer .

Returns

NPP_SUCCESS

  • pSrc â Source Signal Pointer .

  • nLength â Signal Length .

  • pDst â Pointer to the output result.

  • pDeviceBuffer â Pointer to the required device memory allocation.

Returns

Signal Data Related Error Codes , Length Related Error Codes .

NppStatus nppsSumLnGetBufferSize_16s32f_Ctx ( size_t nLength , size_t * hpBufferSize , NppStreamContext nppStreamCtx ) ï

Device scratch buffer size (in bytes) for 16s32f SumLn.

This primitive provides the correct buffer size for nppsSumLn_16s32f.

Parameters

  • nLength â Signal Length .

  • hpBufferSize â Required buffer size. Important: hpBufferSize is a host pointer. Scratch Buffer and Host Pointer .

  • nppStreamCtx â Application Managed Stream Context .

Returns

NPP_SUCCESS

NppStatus nppsSumLnGetBufferSize_16s32f ( size_t nLength , size_t * hpBufferSize ) ï

Parameters

  • nLength â Signal Length .

  • hpBufferSize â Required buffer size. Important: hpBufferSize is a host pointer. Scratch Buffer and Host Pointer .

Returns

Signal Normalize ï

Normalize ï

Normalize each sample of a real or complex signal using offset and division operations.

Functions

32-bit floating point signal normalize.

Parameters

  • pSrc â Source Signal Pointer .

  • pDst â Destination Signal Pointer .

  • nLength â Signal Length .

  • vSub â value subtracted from each signal element before division

  • vDiv â divisor of post-subtracted signal element dividend

  • nppStreamCtx â Application Managed Stream Context .

Returns

Signal Data Related Error Codes , Length Related Error Codes .
